title: The Neighbours
resume: Based on the audience response to short sketches on the show Hurikán, where the family of František Stromokocúra (Peter Marcin) and László Komárom (Andy Kraus) met, their creators and TV Markíza decided to take their destiny to an independent comedy series. While married couples live side by side, but temperament, opinions and ways of life are quite different. They experience humorous situations based on misunderstandings and coincidences that life brings.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 36494   Expand The Neighbours   (2009) User Score Overview Based on the audience response to short sketches on the show Hurikán, where the family of František Stromokocúra (Peter Marcin) and László Komárom (Andy Kraus) met, their creators and TV Markíza decided to take their destiny to an independent comedy series. While married couples live side by side, but temperament, opinions and ways of life are quite different. They experience humorous situations based on misunderstandings and coincidences that life brings.
